metadata.title: Understanding React Server Components: The Future of React Apps

featuredImage.altText: React code on a computer screen

metadata.summary: React Server Components are reshaping how data and UI interact in modern web apps.

content.text: They let you render UI on the server without shipping unnecessary JavaScript to the client, improving speed and SEO. This paradigm shift has profound implications for performance and user experience.

items: Zero-Bundle-Size: Server Components don't send JavaScript to the client.
Direct Data Access: They can directly access databases and APIs on the server.
Improved Performance: Less JavaScript means faster page loads and interactivity.
